text: Chelsea Handler (born February 25 1975) is an American writer, stand-up comedian and actress. She has performed in many movies and television programs. She is the host of Chelsea Lately. She was born near Livingston, New Jersey. Handler was the host of the 2010 MTV Video Music Awards. Are You There, Chelsea? was an NBC sitcom. It was based on Handler's 2008 best-selling book Are You There, Vodka? It's Me, Chelsea. The program aired from January 11 to March 28, 2012. On May 11, 2012, the network canceled it. Laura Prepon played the main character, "Chelsea Newman," a cocktail waitress. Handler was "Chelsea's" born-again Christian sister, "Sloane". She hosted the late-night talk show Chelsea Lately on the E! network from 2007 to 2014, and released a documentary series, Chelsea Does, on Netflix in January 2016. Between 2016 and 2017, Handler hosted the talk show, Chelsea, on Netflix. ==Published Works== * My Horizontal Life: A Collection of One-Night Stands (2005) * Are You There, Vodka? It's Me, Chelsea (2008) * Chelsea Chelsea Bang Bang (2010) * Lies That Chelsea Handler Told Me (2011) * "50 Shades of Chartreuse: This Time it's Personal" (publishing 2012/13) ==Filmography== ===Television and movies=== Year Title Role Notes 2012 Fun Size Wren and Albert's mother Film 2012 Are You There, Chelsea?
